welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mizan Teferi, a charming city known for its lush greenery and vibrant culture. Take the time to explore our beautiful surroundings and immerse yourself in the local way of life. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mizan Teferi Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mizan Teferi Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free by selecting the network and entering a password provided by the airport staff.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tippi Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tippi Airport is responsible for handling air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
